pullrequest.title: Fix problems with latin locales and decimal numbers (issue #60)

content.raw:
This PR solves sdformat issue #60 and [gazebo issue #1397](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/issue/1397/sdf-param-error-unable-to-set-value-for) for me.

`./src/UNIT_Param_TEST` passes for me with or without the fix.

`./test/integration/INTEGRATION_locale_fix` passes with the fix and fails if I remove `std::setlocale(LC_NUMERIC, "C");`.
